meta.description: A major study will assess if new - and existing - drugs can help people with motor neurone disease.

title: MND: The search for new treatments
cleaned_text:
What is the new trial?

"There here has been a lack of progress so far with discovering new therapies for motor neurone disease and I think anything that we can do to improve the quality of life and the survival of people with MND is a step forward for this condition," he says.

opengraph.article:author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
opengraph.description: A major study will assess if new - and existing - drugs can help people with motor neurone disease.
opengraph.image:alt: Alan Gray can no longer walk after being diagnosed with Motor Neurone Disease in 2017.
opengraph.title: MND: The search for new treatments
